alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Gilmer; Towns; Union (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 3:49PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Towns, central Gilmer, northwestern Union and northeastern Fannin Counties through 430 PM EST... At 349 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Culberson to near Tails Creek, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Ellijay, Blue Ridge, Blairsville, East Ellijay, Morganton, Hemp, Tails Creek, Margret, Gumlog, Nottely Dam, Hurst, Ivy Log, Loving, Jones Creek, Dial, Pisgah, Mineral Bluff, Cherry Log and Alexanders Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for north central Georgia.
